content: *wear this beautiful project as a lapel pin for easter sunday mother s day or any day you need a floral pick-me-up kreinik manufacturing * materials from web page * kreinik medium #16 braid one 10m spool each 091 star yellow and 015 chartreuse * kreinik blending filament one 50m spool 032 pearl * crochet cotton size 10 small amount of white * size 7 steel crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge * cotton ball * tapestry needle materials from pdf * crochet cotton size 30 small amounts each white a green b and yellow c * kreinik blending filament 50m per spool 1 spool each pearl #032 bfa green #008 bfb and citron #028 bfc * size 10 steel crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge * 1-inch long pin back * 12-inch length 1/4-wide white satin ribbon * green sewing thread and sewing needle * tapestry needle * spray starch gauge rounds 1 & 2 of calla lily = 5/8-inch in diameter written instructions are provided in pdf download
